name: AX\_Point\_Primitive
constraints: δ acts trivially on the interior of a single Point: δ(P) \= 0
Any Edge E has boundary ∂E \= {P1, P2} where P1 and P2 are Points.
Points have no internal subdivision into other geometric entities.
χ-evolution at this tier does not move or split Points: STEPχ(P, χ) \= P.
Ω imposes only identity constraints on Points (no non-trivial global conservation law is attached at this tier).
